sentences: Ma olen loodud selleks, et olla kasulik.
Loodud olid need inimesed, kes tahtsid muutusi.
Loodud on see v√µimalus, mida me ei tohi lubada
context: The word 'loodud' is the plural form of the past participle of the Estonian verb 'loomama', which means 'to create' or 'to make'. It is commonly used to describe something that has been created or made by someone.
